nodes.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Wiki (In Progress)
nodes.description: My personal take on a wiki for Horizon Zero Dawn. It currently contains catalogs for Machines and Cauldrons, with CRUD features available if logged in as Admin. This is also my first attempt at building a full stack website from scratch ðŸŽ‰

nodes.title: Ateneo Musicians' Pool Website (Mock Redesign)
nodes.description: A mock redesign of the Ateneo Musicians' Pool website. The Ateneo Musicians' Pool (AMP) is a non-profit organization where individuals realize their holistic formation through music.
